FirmwareInfo.Description:
• Bluetooth security patch applied • For iPhone(iOS11), the Preview feature has been added while recording. • The Auto power off setting value, "Never", has been changed to "15 minutes".
※ This upgrade will reset your device to its factory default settings.
FirmwareInfo.DescriptionKor:
• Bluetooth security patch applied • For iPhone(iOS11), the Preview feature has been added while recording. • The Auto power off setting value, "Never", has been changed to "15 minutes".
※ This upgrade will reset your device to its factory default settings.
